select pfm_idx,pfm_date,pfm_time from pfm_dateBytime WHERE pfm_idx= #{pfmIdx}

mapper.select: SELECT seat.seat_row, seat.seat_col FROM book LEFT JOIN seat ON book.seat_idx = seat.seat_idx LEFT JOIN originsection ON seat.ori_sec_idx = originsection.ori_sec_idx WHERE book.pfm_idx = #{pfm.pfmIdx} AND originsection.sec_name = #{secName} AND book.pfm_dbt_idx = #{dateByTimeIdx} AND book.book_cate_idx = 2

SELECT sec.app_sec as appSec, count(*) as cnt FROM book b LEFT JOIN seat s ON b.seat_idx = s.seat_idx LEFT JOIN seatsection sec ON s.ori_sec_idx = sec.ori_sec_idx where sec.pfm_idx = ${pfm.pfmIdx} and b.book_cate_idx = #{bookCateIdx} and b.pfm_dbt_idx = ${pfmDbtIdx} group by sec.app_sec

SELECT sec.app_sec appSec, sec.sec_pay secPay, count(*) cnt FROM seat s LEFT JOIN seatsection sec ON s.ori_sec_idx = sec.ori_sec_idx WHERE s.hall_idx = ${hallIdx} and sec.pfm_idx=${pfmIdx} GROUP BY sec.app_sec,sec.sec_pay
